pages.text: > $(n)Health:$()   $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 4 + Levitation $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() End Cities    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Shulkers$() are box-shaped hostile mobs found in $(thing)End Cities$(). They hide in their shell to blend in with surrounding $(item)Purpur blocks$() and guard the city's various treasures. $(thing)Shulkers$() generally remain stationary, attached to an adjacent solid block. Shoots projectiles with $(thing)Levitation effect$().
